Pre-Game Insights: Márquez is on a mission to find the correct combinations and figure out the right combinations in different areas of the pitch.
Post-Match Reflections: Márquez said the team showed signs of movement toward an upward trajectory, but improvement does not come from a flick of a button, it is a long and winding road.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India's first match with Manolo Márquez as the head coach showed a clean sheet forged by a solid defence, against Mauritius in the Intercontinental Cup 2024 at Gachibowli Stadium, Hyderabad.
Others: The Blue Tigers will play Syria on September 9 in their next match of the Intercontinental Cup, a match that could decide the fate of the three-team competition.
Rahul Bheke had a proud moment as he led the national team out with the captain's armband for the first time.
Bheke echoed his coach's words and felt that step-by-step improvement is the way forward for the Blue Tigers.
